pr_title: FieldConfigurationHelper updates: interface and index-only fields

timeline.message:
FieldConfigurationHelper updates: interface and index-only fields

 . Extracted FieldConfigHelper interface
 . Implementation of FieldConfigurationHelper is XMLFieldConfigHelper
 . FieldConfigHelper now used to configure index-only fields.
 . index-only fields are store=false and indexed=true

timeline.bodyText: This refactor looks good to me. WRT our recent conversation, I'm guessing that the given XML schema could support multiple normalizers for a single field by just making the indexType attribute a comma-delimited list(?) The updateDatawaveTypes method will parse your fieldType var that way at least. I guess a new junit in XMLFieldConfigHelperTest could test that hypothesis, if multiple normalizers per-field is something we need to continue to support
timeline.author: keith-ratcliffe

replies.bodyText: Agreed, I think I'll tackle this in a separate ticket.
replies.author: drewfarris
